alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 01 at 2:56AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong Winds Likely through Wednesday... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Southwest winds increasing to 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 50 mph. Occasional stronger gusts are possible across the higher elevations and in wind prone areas like Wyoming Boulevard south of Casper. * WHERE...Natrona County as well as the Green and Rattlesnake Mountains. * WHEN...Through Wednesday. The strongest wind is expected later Tuesday night and Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel may become difficult, especially for high profile vehicles and vehicles towing trailers.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
